column4: can someone help me understand this command cp ./<kernel version>/wacom_w8001.ko /lib/modules/`uname -r`/kernel/drivers/input/touchscreen/
it keeps responding with a bash error
no such file or dir but i followed the instructions to the dot at http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/linuxwacom/index.php?title=Input-wacom
to see what version you compiled, I think you can do "ls ./"
